title: Jhin - dancing grenade
body: Jhin's dancing grenade will sometimes disappear before affecting 4 targets while clearly being in range to bounce all 4 times, not sure what triggered it to happen or any steps to reproduce, the only thing i can suggest is just Q minion waves and see if you notice it only hitting once or twice and then disappearing.

replies.body: Happens to me too. Always bounces twice, but 3 and 4 disappear occasionally vs minions.

Hey cash in or tilt! 

Thanks for the report! 

We're aware of an issue where Bouncing Grenade(Q) can fizzle if Jhin launches an auto while it's bouncing. We're working to get a fix in ASAP.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=LaMNGr6z,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-28T17:10:17.522+0000)
>
> Hey cash in or tilt! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! 
> 
> We're aware of an issue where Bouncing Grenade(Q) can fizzle if Jhin launches an auto while it's bouncing. We're working to get a fix in ASAP.

Thank you very much Katey!

Completely unrelated but where is my Draven Draven icon

>
> Soon TM. :3


 pls ... i've waited so long
This always happens to me too. It bounces around 2 times and the. Disappears.
i have the same issue. i main jhin. and it happens to me very often
Constantly happening to me for almost a week now, really annoying not getting the cs because of this glitch...
